thread.title: Bill & Stephanie
thread.title_full: Oshawa Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Bill & Stephanie

author: Bill & Stephanie
title: Bill & Stephanie
text: We found the customer service quite exceptional. After our initial purchase we returned two more times finding the same high quality of service. Mike C. was very knowledgable with styles, quality, and cost within our price range. He went above and beyond what we expected and this was greatly appreciated. Our flooring looks amazing.
